attributes.action: MAKE SUPERMARKETS HAND OVER ALL UNSOLD FOOD TO CHARITIES.
attributes.additional_details:
THE UK WASTES THE MOST AMOUNT ON EDIBLE FOOD IN THE UK

Its true. Even the guardian and the telegraph are in agreement!

https://www.theguardian.com/world/2015/may/22/uk-tops-chart-of-eu-food-waste

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/05/16/400-million-meals-worth-of-edible-food-wasted-each-year/
attributes.background:
More than 400 million meals' worth of edible food waste from UK shops and manufacturers is not being redistributed to those in need each year, a major Government-funded report has found.

People are needy and hungry, and supermarkets are burning food.

STOP THE WASTE!

rejection.details:
We think that your petition is similar to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167505

You might want to consider supporting this petition.
